name: FNF Playground [Rebooted]
description:
Helo there. Long time no see!

Looky at this! A remade FNF Playground!

With better animations, (minus ENA lol. I wanted her to look like that :v) a very pointless lifebar with icons and better menus for the character selection and the song menu! Even a stop song button!! Now, you can stop the song whenever you want, without pressing the goofy aah green flag!

Anyhow, enjoy the gamey :3

Controls!

Character Selection Menu:

W and D - Switch characters

Space - Select character

Character Movement:

WASD - Left Character (Q - Pose)

Arrows keys - Right Character (E - Pose)

Song List:

Switch Song - Click on the arrows on the sides

Space - Select song
